Stack trace shows that we are attempting a source lookup to display source for 
a selected stack frame, but the thread had already resumed. I wonder if we 
attempted a source lookup while evaluating a toString() in the variables view? 
Leaving open for now.

Fixed. The stack frame reports with a status code that its thread has resumed, 
and the source locator returns null for a source element in this case. No error 
is logged.
*** Bug 14085 has been marked as a duplicate of this bug. ***
